Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two people with a general representation of a string between them (basic understanding of connection).
Show cups or cans as part of the string telephone setup (recognizes essential components).
Indicate that the string is involved in communication (partial understanding of its role).
CANNOT: Consistently show the string as tight (may draw it slack or wavy, indicating misunderstanding of tension's role).
Accurately demonstrate how sound travels through the string (may not depict sound waves or misrepresent their path).
Illustrate the absence of electrical or modern technology as a communication factor (might not include or incorrectly add electrical items).
Explain how the device solves the problem of communication over distance (might not show or explain this aspect, as it's more abstract).
